content.content: Endgame V3  Endgame V3 Full Post Endgame V3 Summary (LOD2)    Endgame Concept LOD Summaries   What are LOD Summaries? LOD summaries are organized into sections summarizing the same information in different levels of detail.  LOD0 represents the most-simplified and abstracted version of this concept LOD1 is more complex and more accurate. LOD2 is a direct summary of Rune’s post. Runes post could be considered LOD3, with the highest level of detail and explanation.  Lower numbers = Easier to grasp and understand. Higher numbers = More complex but more accurate.   Unbiased Currency Stances Collateral Categories  Active Dai Supply/Demand Levers MakerCore Governance Roles MetaDAOs Scopes Pregame Products   Older Endgame Posts   Deprecated?  Part 1 - Introduction Part 2 - Endgame Plan Launch  Part 3 - The Decentralized Workforce Part 4 - Understanding MetaDAOs Part 5 - Endgame Product Roadmap - Pregame and Early game   Endgame Posts (Español)  Parte 1 - Introducción Parte 2 - Lanzamiento del Plan Final   Endgame Post Summaries  Part 1 - Introdution Part 2 - Endgame Plan Launch Part 3 - The Decentralized Workforce Part 4 - Understanding MetaDAOs Part 5 - Endgame Product Roadmap - Pregame and Early game    Recordings  Decentralized Voter Committee Call Recordings   Calls to Action   Endgame Party Delegate Signup - English / Español  Decentralized Voter Committee Call Agendas
content.GPT-summary: The post is about the Endgame Index List, which includes various sections such as LOD Summaries, Unbiased Currency Stances, MakerCore Governance Roles, and more. The post explains the concept of LOD Summaries and provides links to older Endgame Posts and Endgame Post Summaries. The post also includes recordings and calls to action related to the Endgame Party Delegate Signup and Decentralized Voter Committee Call Agendas. The post is not asking for feedback or collaboration, but rather explaining and advertising the proposal.

content.content: Hey folks.  I’ve added a summary of EndgameV3 Overview, was difficult to cut it down significantly, did my best. I also added the first LOD summary, covering unbiased currency stances at various levels of detail. I’m planning to write LOD summaries for:  Maker Level Governance Roles - DONE  Active DAI Supply/Demand Levers - DONE  Endgame Collateral Categories - DONE  MetaDAOs - DONE  Scopes - DONE  Pregame Products - DONE  Early Game Products - POSTPONED     I may add mid/endgame product LOD summaries once they are better defined by Rune. In general, if you want to understand endgame with the least pain possible, I’d suggest waiting for the LOD summaries above. I’ll also release an aggregate of the LOD0 summaries that will serve as both:  Reference material to lookup stuff people are talking about. A layman’s guide to what endgame includes.
